author: nero_eth
content:
That's the PR defining the BAL RPC methods:
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/726

We have discussed those briefly in the BAL breakout call but thought it might be better to get input here, making sure everything's fine.
Feel free to comment here or directly on the PR.

content: Since geth has eth_getBlockAccessList implemented in bal-devnet-2, would you like me to add a test to the generator to generators.go so the .io files can be auto-generated? Let me know!
